problems.title: Bag Full Light / Motor Shutoff
problems.description: The bag light is red and the machine turns off to protect the motor.
solution_steps: Do not wash Sebo filters; they must be replaced.

problems.title: Brush Roll Jammed / Red Light on Head
problems.description: The power head light turns red and the brush stops.
solution_steps: Press the button on the side to pop out the brush roller (no tools needed).
If bristles are worn flat, replace the brush strip.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a Felix / Dart Upright?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $439 vacuum, and extending the life of your Sebo is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Felix / Dart Upright needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include reduced performance and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my Felix / Dart Upright myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
